entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
